name: Laval Arena
description:
Laval Arena is a round based TCG. One round is over quite fast too so you will have many rounds to play. Laval Arena is in Alpha State right now.

Features 250 Cards right now. You can play freeplay, tournament or ranked mode. You can also buy Cards in the Shop and create your own decks to fight!

Online Multiplayer may be intergrated in the future too! Stats are now saved online for anti-cheat.

The Game will download all assets on first bootup.
